LanguageData.Apparel_FurCoat_Westerado.label: coat
LanguageData.Apparel_FurCoat_Westerado.description: A fur coat for staying warm in even the coldest of temperatures.
LanguageData.Apparel_RebelCoat_Westerado.label: rebel coat
LanguageData.Apparel_RebelCoat_Westerado.description: A grey coat for staying warm on the battlefield, popular with rebels.
LanguageData.Apparel_Vest_Westerado.label: vest
LanguageData.Apparel_Vest_Westerado.description: A vest for blocking the sun and grit of the desert.
LanguageData.Apparel_Poncho_Westerado.label: poncho
LanguageData.Apparel_Poncho_Westerado.description: A poncho for blocking the sun and grit of the desert.
LanguageData.Apparel_RimindDress_Westerado.label: rimind dress
LanguageData.Apparel_RimindDress_Westerado.descriptio: A full-body garment crafted using medieval tools. While it may look primitive, it is effective at insulating the wearer.
A full-body garment crafted using medieval tools. A nice looking dress used for mostly ceremonial purposes, however sometimes used in war as well.
LanguageData.Apparel_Bandolier_Westerado.label: bandolier
LanguageData.Apparel_Bandolier_Westerado.description: A bandolier with bullets. Faster reload.
LanguageData.Apparel_VestPlateBone_Westerado.label: bone breastplate
LanguageData.Apparel_VestPlateBone_Westerado.descript: A breastplate made out of hollowed out bones beaded together with string. Protects against weapons.
